channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two dumped mattresses, 7th October
item.description:
Two mattresses have been dumped on the corner of Pendrell street SE18 and garland road SE18 2ru

item.title: Red bin bag fly tipped split open, 7th October
item.description:
Red bin bag which seems to be left a lot here has been opened by foxes and litter covers the street and green areas. More pests seen going through it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haggerston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped wooden pallets, 7th October
item.description:
2 wooden pallets dumped against the wall under the wall. If the fall on anyone, it may injure them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Unit 247, 248, Pelier Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree causing wall damage, 7th October
item.description:
A tree near Long Lane Planters around the corner from Barbican Station on Aldersgate Street fell over the weekend, and has knocked down some of the wall, was reported yesterday by a separate member of staff as well

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Lane, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Priory Park Road and St Julian road, 7th October
item.description:
Sofa and tv screens left there. Then there is a pink suitcase outside the construction side in Priory park Road and a something that looks like a little fridge outside the school.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Water leak needing urgent attention, 7th October
item.description:
Extensive water leak noticed two days ago. A large amount of water is escaping onto the main streets. This happened before and not long ago… the fix then was obviously temporary or the water has found a new way to gush out. Urgent attention needed!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Hermitage, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 sofas and a mattress fly tipped, 7th October
item.description:
2 sofas and a mattress have been fly tipped in front of the flats on Montpelier road. The fly tipping is obstructing the use of the bins used by residents of the flats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpelier Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
